name: BallRush
description:
Left Mouse Button - use Defense

Right mouse button - use Ability

Escape - Close the game

Defenses:

lazerGun:

attack speed: 1.4s

can Hit: Up to 5

damage:1

cost: 200

Flame:

attack speed: 0.2s

can Hit: always 1 ball

damage:1-5(depends on your luck)

cost: 150

Abilities:

Sniper: Destroys the stronger ball on the map

Couldown: 3s

Portal: Teleports the balls to the starting point over 2.5s

Couldown: 10s

EnemiesTypes - Normal, Electric, Fast

Your aim is to survive as much as you can

Enjoy :)
